infoArray.name: as
infoArray.desc: what format the FileReader should read the file as (i.e., buffer, binary, url, text). Defaults to url.

infoArray.name: children
infoArray.desc: if children is passed into FileReaderInput, then the component will hide the native file input and instead display children. Whenever the custom children are clicked, the component will trigger the native file input prompt. This allows complete control over styling an display.

infoArray.name: multiple
infoArray.desc: If true, user can select multiple.

infoArray.name: handleChange
infoArray.desc: callback function(event, results). Results will be an array of arrays, the size of which depending on how many files were selected.
